# GKTurnTimeoutNone

**Global Variable**

No timeout to take a turn.

## Declaration

```swift
var GKTurnTimeoutNone: TimeInterval
```

## Timeouts

- **GKTurnTimeoutDefault**: A one-week time limit to take a turn.
